snippet: SIEGEL--Jerome. Westchester Community College and the Westchester Community College Foundation extend our sympathies to the family of Jerome Siegel. Hundreds of students were able to realize their dreams of a college education due to generous scholarship contributions from the Siegel Foundation. A member of our College Foundation Board since 1994, he supported this organization and made lasting connections with many of our students. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SIEGEL--Jerome. Westchester Community College and the Westchester Community College Foundation extend our sympathies to the family of Jerome Siegel. Hundreds of students were able to realize their dreams of a college education due to generous scholarship contributions from the Siegel Foundation. A member of our College Foundation Board since 1994, he supported this organization and made lasting connections with many of our students. 1/3
